verses.roman:
gṛhastha ha-iyā kariba pitā-mātāra sevana
ihāte-i tuṣṭa habena lakṣmī-nārāyaṇa

synonyms: gṛhastha—a householder; ha-iyā—becoming; kariba—I shall do; pitā-mātāra—of the parents; sevana—service; ihāte-i—in this; tuṣṭa—satisfied; habena—will become; lakṣmī-nārāyaṇa—the goddess of fortune and Nārāyaṇa.
translation: " 'Later I shall become a householder and thus serve My parents, for this action will very much satisfy Lord Nārāyaṇa and His wife, the goddess of fortune.'
